data.message: Thank you so much Eminem you have changed my life in so many different ways. I give you so much respect for what you have done to and the hole society. You are smart i a way the many people are not. In a video i just finish watching I so the way you  rhymed the word orange with different words and that is how smart you are than many other rappers. Thank put for what you have done for me and i hope to you Eminem respond.
